```{r setup, include = FALSE}
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = ""

```

Here we will download a single subject from the cross-sectional data with MS using the `download_ms_patient` function:

```{r}
library(msdata)
files = download_ms_patient(
  id = 2, 
  cohort = "cross_sectional",
  data = "raw")
```


```{r}
library(oro.nifti)
fname = files[1]
```
